title: Common Denominator
text: The fractions have a common denominator, so subtract the numerators and place the sum over the common denominator
speech: The fractions have a common denominator, so subtract the numerators and place the sum over the common denominator
pacedSpeech: The fractions have a common denominator, so subtract the numerators and place the sum over the common denominator

title: Factor
text: Factor the numerator and simplify by removing the common factors.
speech: Factor the numerator and simplify by removing the common factors.
pacedSpeech: Factor the numerator and simplify by removing the common factors.

title: Numerator
text: The numerator can be factored into $$\left(n+10\right) \left(n-10\right)$$
speech: The numerator can be factored into  parentheses n plus 10,  times, parentheses n minus 10,
